<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Shepherd of Souls](/Spells.aspx?ID=787)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 236 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Trigger** A living creature within 30 feet takes damage.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You stay the hand of fate for one not yet destined to die, sacrificing some of your own vitality to heal them. You lose up to 15 Hit Points as a sacrifice, and the target reduces the damage by twice the number of Hit Points sacrificed. If this reduction exceeds the amount of damage, the target recovers Hit Points equal to the excess amount.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The maximum number of Hit Points you can sacrifice increases by 5.
name: Shepherd of Souls
